> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, Bonus Eventus said:
> 
> 
> 1.075 is out 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/130809-11-kerbodyne-plus/&do=embed&embedComment=2536482&embedDo=findComment#comment-2536482"></iframe>
> 

Now, Mother is approaching!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> 
> 
> 19 hours ago, Bonus Eventus said:
> 
> 
> [![PQZ31Cu.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PQZ31Cu.jpg)](http://i.imgur.com/PQZ31Cu.jpg "Enlarge image")
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Ka-Bam! Large spherical xenon tanks embedded in a T202 truss, the new T202 F-2 Xe. Decided to add it now to make building an ELF worthy craft a little easier.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Just have to finish the engine shroud, then 1.075 will be done.
> 

very similar to NF Construction! would be nice to see some crew transfer modules embedded in the trusses, especially the t404 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> 
> 
> On 4/26/2016 at 0:07 PM, Bonus Eventus said:
> 
> 
> Yeah, it would be great if you could post some pics!
> 

I believe you've seen one of these craft, before, but I decided to build out a fleet. I'll be rebuilding it, although I'm half-tempted to wait until you release Mother. (GAH. Did I just say that!? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") )

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/oJSsf/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>
Hey Bonus, what do you plan on adding for the K-Plus/Mother 1.1?

Well, I'm in the middle of figuring that out. I don't want to be too ambitious. Heres a list of goals/ideas for Mother, I haven't decided on when to do what or even if I'll include them though.

- A complete structural system for making spacecraft spines.
    - Docking ports
    - Decouplers
    - SAS
    - Adapters
    - Flywheels
    - Radial attachment points
- Robotics
    - cranes
    - tugs
    - claw arms
- New solar panels
- Complete radiator system
- Orbital docking bay
- Hangar/Factory
- Resource tanks of all kinds
    - Hydrogen
    - Argon
    - Ore
    - Water
    - Oxygen
    - Food
    - Rocket Parts
- Command pods
    - 3.75
    - 7.5
- Crew Cabins
    - 3.75
    - 7.5
    - science labs
- Ring hab system
- Radiation Shields

I think I want to go in a new direction that guides gameplay/players to have to develope tech stacks and infrastructure to make a mothership. In other words one would have to first build a mining operation and then a space station with factory to then build the mothership in microgravity.
Can I suggest some Inflatable Fuel Tanks too? I think they will be very useful for long travel and long range ship, when using a resorce system (Ore, karbonite and so on).
Robotics and docking bay sound very interesting!![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

radiation shields eh?

200m in diameter I hope ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

And the command pods, maybe you could integrate RPM, and ASET into that I hope.

Maybe other modders could help you, or maybe I could help too but I would need some help with 3D modeling as I'm kind of a noob. I'm gonna have to watch some YouTube tutorials.

Only thing I made on Blender so far was nothing xD

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-03T02:40:57Z" title="05/03/2016 02:40  AM" data-short="8 yr">May 3, 2016</time> by Table**

suffered a moderate neck injury, so setbacks ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(") It's nearly healed now. Long story short, be careful when doing this with a 55 pound kettle bell...

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/__H8S_4Zk8o?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>
Well, I hope you get better soon!

seems like the thread is dead, keep the suggestions and discussion up guys ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(") 

hyped for the Mother release, even though it's probably a long time away!

Any progress? I would love if you would post what you're working on on this thread.

It looks really great, but why did you give it an entry-cost cost of 500000? ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon2.png ":o") This seems way to high for a fuel tank. Perhaps it has one too many zeros?

**Edited <time datetime="2018-09-03T06:07:03Z" title="09/03/2018 06:07  AM" data-short="5 yr">September 3, 2018</time> by FreeThinker**
yes, I'm working on a new mod called Mother which is sort of an updated version of K+ that's meant to work with mods.
[@Bonus Eventus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/115722-bonus-eventus/) If you provide the download link for "Mother", I will die a happy man.
